description: High-level system overview documenting the core architecture, key components, and their interactions within the TreesRadio application
Comprehensive documentation of the core data models including Profile, Chat, Playlist, Song, and User models with their relationships and Firebase schema definitions
Detailed documentation of the custom store implementations (profile, playlists, chat, playing) including state flow, computed properties, and real-time synchronization with Firebase
Documentation of key algorithms including playlist management, toke session timing, waitlist management, and chat synchronization mechanisms
Documentation of data and event flow between major components, focusing on the player, chat, playlist, and toke session interactions
